Message:
Being surrounded by nature,
in all its stillness and beauty,

casts my mind back to Vyde
in its former glory.

With my kingdom fallen
to its cursed fate,
as the Queen,
my duty is to restore it.

However, at times
I become filled with anxiety.

After all, the world is a stage.
We are all helpless players,
merely performing
a script called “Fate.”

There is nothing
we humans can do...

...This is not what
I should be doing.
I came here to relax,
yet here I am weighing
myself down with
such thoughts.

Indeed. We went to
great lengths to visit
this wonderful lake, after all.

Once Ophelia joins me,
we will go for a swim.

There should be a cliff in
the direction she is heading...

No chances must be taken.
I shall pursue her at once.
